info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:39PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton, northwestern Warren and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 737 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wells, or 13 miles southeast of Speculator, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Speculator, Johnsburg, North Creek, Thurman, Harrisburg, Garnet Lake, Gilmantown, Sodom, Girards Sugarbush, Edwards Hill, Christian Hill, Wevertown, Holcombville, Knowelhurst, Bakertown, North River, Bakers Mills, High Street and Athol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern and east central New York.
